text: ew: X-Linked Adrenoleukodystrophy  - Genetic Testing Registry: Adrenoleukodystrophy  - Genomics Education Programme (UK)  - MedlinePlus Encyclopedia: Adrenoleukodystrophy  - National Marrow Donor Program  - X-linked Adrenoleukodystrophy Database: Diagnosis of X-ALD   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,X-li
